lot of people having probs here.  this is easily installed and doesnt need any crack for the original fear, even with the 1.8 patch.  just install your original fear, update to 1.8.  double click one of the first rar files in cd1 and you'll get the iso/bin files, do the same for cd2.  mount cd1 with poweriso (or something) and install.  when it asks for the serial, double click the keygen on CD2 (just mount it in a second virtual drive and explore in my computer).  the keygen has some strange letters doesnt actually say keygen.  after that direct the install to CD2 when it asks and you're installed.  swap the cracks FOUND ON CD2, NOT IN THE SEPERATE FOLDER.  and when you put the fearxp file in make sure you redirect the desktop shortcut to it, or it will go to the launcher file which you dont want.  hope that was helpfull.  but long winded!!!
the rld-fepkg.exe file is the keygen, you DO need it.

Thanks to liquidshrapnel, now it works! :)

(I had copied the crack-files in the folder, instead of from CD2, and was getting really frustrated.)

If you love the game, buy it! (Yes, I know, hypocritical, but I own the original game, and wanted to buy this expansion. But the morons at my local store were sold out, even though they still had (and in fact still have!) the cover on display!!)

Right, so to add a little more clarity to liquidshrapnel's comments you unrar the two disks and either burn them or mount them.  Install from the disks or images using the keys from the nfo file or the keygen.  It was not necessary for me to install any updates to the original FEAR game ( I may have had all updates installed already).  To crack the game, copy the fearxp.exe (for FEAR Xtraction Point, not windows XP) from the crack folder of CD2 to the installation folder of the installed game, which should be a folder under your original FEAR game.  Make a shortcut of that fearxp.exe file and you can run the game from anywhere. 
Runs well for me and picks up right where FEAR leaves off.  
TIP for older computers that can barely run the game a min settings, turn on DX8 shaders.  It seemed to speed up frame rates to a manageable level for me.
P4, 2.4G with FX5200 PCI, not PCIe

Lulz. Siwwy newfags, Let me give you a quick computer lesson. rlf-fepkg.exe is this thing called a Keygen (Pronounced Key-Jen) and is short for Key generator, or something that generates serial keys. Because of they way they are work and are made, like cracks, are often picked up as a Trojan when they are harmless. This is called a False Positive, as in a untrue result. Ok kids? I hope I've helped you 5 year olds :)
